name: @abstractplay/renderer
description: Renders Abstract Play game states graphically

scripts.build: npm run build-ts && npm run tslint
scripts.full-dev: npm run test && npm run build && npm run dist-dev
scripts.full-prod: npm run test && npm run build && npm run dist-prod
scripts.distribute: copy .\test\index.html D:\xampp\htdocs\renderer && copy .\test\playground.html D:\xampp\htdocs\renderer && copy .\dist\APRender.js D:\xampp\htdocs\renderer && copy .\dist\APRender.js D:\xampp\htdocs\games
scripts.quick: npm run build-ts && npm run dist-dev && npm run distribute
scripts.quick2: npm run build-ts && npm run dist-dev && npm run distribute2

author: Aaron Dalton <aaron@daltons.ca> (https://www.perlkonig.com)
